opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Gerling Global Reinsurance Corporation of America v. Garamendi, Insurance Commissioner, State of California

opinion:
539 U.S. 955

Gerling Global Reinsurance Corporation of America et al.
v.
Garamendi, Insurance Commissioner, State of California.

No. 02-733.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 27, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 9th Cir.

2

The Court reversed the judgment below in American Ins. Assn. v. Garamendi, ante, p. 396. Therefore, certiorari granted, and case remanded for further proceedings. Reported below: 296 F. 3d 832.
